message.content:
cs.CL, cs.RO, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.CV. 

The paper focuses on natural language understanding for robots, which is a topic that falls under the intersection of several CS sub-fields. "cs.CL" (Computation and Language) is the most likely category as it specifically deals with natural language processing. "cs.RO" (Robotics) is also highly likely as the paper discusses the application of the proposed method on two robots. "cs.AI" (Artificial Intelligence) is another relevant category as the paper proposes a model that uses probabilistic graphical models for inference. "cs.LG" (Machine Learning) is also a possible category as the paper discusses the training of the models on a corpus of annotated instructions. Finally, "cs.CV" (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) is a possible category as the paper discusses the use of perceptual classifiers for scene understanding.
